text: Senator Heloisa Helena ( Workers Party -- Alagoas ) said that Latin American countries should always join together to speak with international economic institutions , in order to maintain autonomy in their economies : " Now we see what happens when one country abdicates its financial autonomy . I hope that this can alert the Brazilian Government to revise its relationship with the IMF . "
